verses.verse: A Psalm for SHlomo <S%H8010><s%>. Give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> thy judgments <S%H4941><s%>, O 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and thy righteousness <S%H6666><s%> unto the king's <S%H4428><s%> son <S%H1121><s%>.
He shall judge <S%H1777><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thy people <S%H5971><s%> with righteousness <S%H6664><s%>, and thy poor <S%H6041><s%> with judgment <S%H4941><s%>.
The mountains <S%H2022><s%> shall bring <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> to the people <S%H5971><s%>, and the little hills <S%H1389><s%>, by righteousness <S%H6666><s%>.

He shall judge <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the poor <S%H6041><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>, he shall save <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of the needy <S%H34><s%>, and shall break in pieces <S%H1792><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the oppressor <S%H6231><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.
They shall fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee as long as <S%H5973><s%> the sun <S%H8121><s%> and moon <S%H3394><s%> endure <S%H6440><s%>, throughout all <S%H1755><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>.
He shall come down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8799><s%> like rain <S%H4306><s%> upon the mown <S%H1488><s%> grass: as showers <S%H7241><s%> that water <S%H2222><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>.
In his days <S%H3117><s%> shall the righteous <S%H6662><s%> flourish <S%H6524><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; and abundance <S%H7230><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%> so long as the moon <S%H3394><s%> endureth.
He shall have dominion <S%H7287><s%> <S%H8799><s%> also from sea <S%H3220><s%> to sea <S%H3220><s%>, and from the river <S%H5104><s%> unto the ends <S%H657><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.

They that dwell in the wilderness <S%H6728><s%> shall bow <S%H3766><s%> <S%H8799><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him; and his enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%> shall lick <S%H3897><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the dust <S%H6083><s%>.

The kings <S%H4428><s%> of Tarshish <S%H8659><s%> and of the isles <S%H339><s%> shall bring <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%> presents <S%H4503><s%>: the kings <S%H4428><s%> of SH'va <S%H7614><s%> and Seba <S%H5434><s%> shall offer <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8686><s%> gifts <S%H814><s%>.
Yea, all kings <S%H4428><s%> shall fall down <S%H7812><s%> <S%H8691><s%> before him: all nations <S%H1471><s%> shall serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him.

For he shall deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the needy <S%H34><s%> when he crieth <S%H7768><s%> <S%H8764><s%>; the poor <S%H6041><s%> also, and him that hath no helper <S%H5826><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.
He shall spare <S%H2347><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the poor <S%H1800><s%> and needy <S%H34><s%>, and shall save <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the souls <S%H5315><s%> of the needy <S%H34><s%>.

He shall redeem <S%H1350><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their soul <S%H5315><s%> from deceit <S%H8496><s%> and violence <S%H2555><s%>: and precious <S%H3365><s%> <S%H8799><s%> shall their blood <S%H1818><s%> be in his sight <S%H5869><s%>.

And he shall live <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and to him shall be given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of the gold <S%H2091><s%> of SH'va <S%H7614><s%>: prayer also shall be made <S%H6419><s%> <S%H8691><s%> for him continually <S%H8548><s%>; and daily <S%H3117><s%> shall he be praised <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%>.

There shall be an handful <S%H6451><s%> of corn <S%H1250><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%> upon the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mountains <S%H2022><s%>; the fruit <S%H6529><s%> thereof shall shake <S%H7493><s%> <S%H8799><s%> like Lebanon <S%H3844><s%>: and they of the city <S%H5892><s%> shall flourish <S%H6692><s%> <S%H8686><s%> like grass <S%H6212><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.

His name <S%H8034><s%> shall endure for ever <S%H5769><s%>: his name <S%H8034><s%> shall be continued <S%H5125><s%> <S%H8735><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H5125><s%> <S%H8686><s%> as long as <S%H6440><s%> the sun <S%H8121><s%>: and men shall be blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8691><s%> in him: all nations <S%H1471><s%> shall call him blessed <S%H833><s%> <S%H8762><s%>.

Blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8803><s%> be the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, the 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, who only doeth <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%> wondrous things <S%H6381><s%> <S%H8737><s%>.

And blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8803><s%> be his glorious <S%H3519><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>: and let the whole earth <S%H776><s%> be filled <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8735><s%> with his glory <S%H3519><s%>; Amen <S%H543><s%>, and Amen <S%H543><s%>.
The prayers <S%H8605><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Yishai <S%H3448><s%> are ended <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8795><s%>.
